title: The Essential Guide to Wheat Barley and Oats in Farming Simulator 25

tasks.task: Planting, harvesting, storing, and using wheat, barley, and oats}
subtasks: Select combine harvester and grain header (e.g., Macdon Flex Draper)} \\
Seed wheat, barley, or oats using a seeder (e.g., Limpkin Sultar 12)} \\
Apply fertilizer, lime, and cultivate the soil as needed} \\
Check crop growth and use herbicide if necessary} \\
Harvest grain with the combine harvester} \\
Collect straw using a baler or forage wagon (demonstrated with Fent Tigro 75 VRD)} \\
Store grain in silos (e.g., brick, concrete, Americanized, steel silo, or grain bin)} \\
Store straw in hayloft or bale storage} \\
Use grain in production processes (e.g., grain mill, bakery, cereal factory)} \\
Utilize straw as animal bedding, TMR, or bedding for manure production} \\
Apply straw swath during harvesting to collect more straw but reduce yield bonus} \\
Use Macdon swather and pickup header for increased grain yield (24.9% bonus)} \\
